snippet: Sim Bhullar became the first player of Indian descent to sign a contract with an N.B.A. team, joining the Sacramento Kings.
abstract: Sim Bhullar becomes first player of Indian descent to sign a contract with an NBA team, joining Sacramento Kings; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Sim Bhullar became the first player of Indian descent to sign a contract with an N.B.A. team, joining the Sacramento Kings.

headline.main: Kings Sign First Indian in N.B.A.
headline.print_headline: Kings Sign First Indian Player in N.B.A.
